title: Institution, impact of candidate control in Iran

content.question: Identify the institution in Iran that controls which candidates can run for the Majles. Describe how this institution controls the selection process. Explain how the candidate selection process influences electoral competition.

frqParts.text: Identify the institution in Iran that controls which candidates can run for the Majles. Describe how this institution controls the selection process. Explain how the candidate selection process influences electoral competition.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
